name: Anett Futatabi
description: Annet Futatabi (アネット再び), is a 1993 side scrolling, beat-em-up video game developed by Wolf Team for the Sega CD hardware add-on for the Sega Genesis. It is the final in a trilogy of games that also includes Earnest Evans and El Viento. The game was published by Wolf Team in Japan in March 1993.
